item.title: Creating an Angular schematic and turn it into an nx plugin
item.description: In this blog post I would like to explain how you can write a schematic and turn it into an nx plugin or turn an existing schematic into an nx plugin. Knowledge Prerequisites There are a lot of blog posts out there which deal with how you can get started writing a schematic in much more detail as we do not cover this here one more time in depth. Be sure to check out:
